mapper.select: SELECT com.t_commodity_id tCommodityId , com.gt_id gtId, com.c_goods_sn cGoodsSn, com.c_name cName, com.c_counter_price cCounterPrice, com.c_retail_price cRetailPrice, com.c_is_hot cIsHot, com.c_is_new cIsNew, com.c_is_on_sale cIsOnSale, com.c_keywords cKeywords, com.c_unit cUnit, com.c_brief cBrief, com.c_number cNumber, pic.pic_url picUrl, pic.pic_type picType FROM t_commodity com LEFT JOIN t_pic pic ON com.c_goods_sn=pic.c_goods_sn WHERE com.c_goods_sn = #{id}
